title: Pixel 2 useless after Android 11 update
content:
Wish they would break update into updates for security patches and update for new functionality.  Don't need forced functionality updates, happy with what I had.  DO NEED security updates.
Broken - 
1. Gestures - why - don't want it, don't need it but can't turn off
2. Soft buttons to minimize or close apps no longer work
3. Squeeze Pixel 2 sides to open Google Assistant - nope
4. Related to #3 but yet different - Hey Google does not work, important when driving to have Android Auto play tunes on your favorite music player.  Can't now.
4. date time & weather no longer displayed on screen when phone not in use - why?
5. NO NOTIFICATION of text messages - I actually have to look at phone to see if i have any messages
6.  Why do I have to be here - shouldn't phone just work?  It's my phone, I paid for it, new features should be a choice not a requirement.  Why am I on here posting instead of living life, what a waste of time.
7.  Since update rolled out yesterday I have no idea what else is broke.  

Adding info as I discover more borken;
8.  Outlook no longer receiving email
9.  Hitting volume up button then the bottom box used to open sound volume for everything.  No more?

Yes, I have a Pixel 2.  Looks like it's new out of the box phone and until and update yesterday worked just fine.  Forced upgrade will be an iPhone.
